SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, IMG_NAME, IMG_PATH FROM WISHLIST W LEFT JOIN PRODUCT P USING(PRODUCT_NAME) LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMG PI USING(PRODUCT_NAME) WHERE USER_ID = ? AND PI.IMG_NAME LIKE '%_1.png%'
DELETE FROM WISHLIST WHERE USER_ID = ? AND PRODUCT_NAME = ?

SELECT ST.USER_ID AS RESELLER, ST.STOCK_NO, ST.STATUS, C.CART_NO, ST.PRODUCT_NAME, P.BRAND_NAME, ST.PRICE, "SIZE", CART_COUNT, PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME FROM CART C LEFT JOIN STOCK ST ON C.STOCK_NO = ST.STOCK_NO LEFT JOIN PRODUCT P ON ST.PRODUCT_NAME = P.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMG PI ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = PI.PRODUCT_NAME WHERE C.USER_ID = ? AND ST.STATUS IN(1,2) AND IMG_NAME LIKE '%_1.png'
